lead_paragraph: WOODS--John "Jack" H. 73, of Scottsdale, AZ, passed away July 3, 2016. Born in Providence, RI, on March 11, 1943, he was raised in Staten Island, NY and then moved to New Jersey. He was a Member of the New York Stock Exchange for 28 years. He is survived by his loving wife, Jeanne; daughter Jennifer (Daniel) Slotterback; son John "Jack" (Kerstin) Woods; daughter Cynthia (Frank) Slotterback; grandchildren Emma, Paul, Aila, Lumi, Elina, Jennifer, Michael, Ben, Christopher and AJ; and sister Marcia Woods Pollock. A memorial will be held in October in New Jersey. Donations can be sent to Hospice of the Valley (www.HOV.org). 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WOODS, JOHN "JACK" H
